BIO

My commitment to growth and continuous learning shines through in every undertaking. As a naturally creative individual, I've consistently found unique and innovative solutions to the challenges I've faced. Whether leading diverse teams or delving into advanced web development courses, I've seamlessly blended team dynamics with technical expertise. Discover below my unique journey that intertwines the worlds of coffee and coding, showcasing a distinctive fusion of leadership and backend development proficiency.

Starbucks

Shift Supervisor

2018-2022

I've had the privilege of working closely with a diverse range of captivating personalities, guiding and directing them daily. My role involved strategically organizing positions for each individual during their shifts, akin to mastering a game of 'temperament Tetris'. Beyond team management, I also oversaw key financial tasks and maintained inventory responsibilities. Through these experiences, I honed my skills in conflict resolution, financial management, and efficient inventory control.

BloomTech

Backend Development

2023

Furthering my technical expertise, I immersed myself in the Bloomtech backend development course, a rigorous 1,440-hour online program jointly developed with Amazon. This comprehensive training honed my skills in Java programming, testing methodologies, software engineering principles, data structures, and algorithms. Armed with this robust training, I'm poised to contribute effectively to engineering teams across diverse corporate landscapes.
